summary: Solid, scoped plan with clean component separation and TypeScript usage. However, there’s a critical Next.js App Router client/server boundary issue and a few setup and accessibility gaps that will affect build, styling, and usability.

issues.message: TodoItem is imported into a Client Component (TodoList) but is not marked as a client component. In App Router, Client Components cannot import Server Components. This will fail at build/runtime and event handlers won’t work.
Path alias '@/...' is used but the tsconfig path mapping isn’t shown. Without it, imports like '@/types/todo' will fail.
Tailwind setup details are missing. Without proper content globs and @tailwind imports, styles may be purged or not applied.
issues.location: tailwind.config.ts (content: ['./app/**/*.{ts,tsx}','./components/**/*.{ts,tsx}']); app/globals.css (@tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities); app/layout.tsx (import './globals.css')

issues.message: Use functional state updates to avoid stale state in rapid updates.
issues.location: components/TodoList.tsx (setTodos(prev => [...prev, newTodo]); setTodos(prev => prev.map(...)); setTodos(prev => prev.filter(...)))

issues.message: Improve accessibility: associate labels with inputs and ensure clear focus states. The checkbox and text input should have labels/aria-labels.
issues.location: components/TodoItem.tsx (label for checkbox); components/AddTodo.tsx (label for text input)

issues.message: Prefer semantic list markup (<ul>/<li>) for the todo list to aid screen readers.
Handle long todo text to prevent layout breakage.
README should include Node/Next/Tailwind versions, Tailwind setup notes, tsconfig alias note, and common scripts.
Add standard scripts and tooling for consistency.
issues.location: package.json (scripts: dev, build, start, lint, type-check; add ESLint/Prettier config)

issues.message: crypto.randomUUID() is fine in modern browsers, but consider a fallback or nanoid if broader support is desired.
